H0.text: What is the largest city and capital of Madeira. Lisbon

H1.text: What is the largest city and capital of Madeira. Porto

H2.text: What is the largest city and capital of Madeira. Ponta Delgada

H3.text: What is the largest city and capital of Madeira. Funchal

A4.text: Funchal is the largest city and capital of Madeira.

A5.text: Lisbon is not the largest city or capital of Madeira.

A6.text: Porto is not the largest city or capital of Madeira.

A7.text: Ponta Delgada is not the largest city or capital of Madeira.
